result.arabic_text: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
result.translation: (13) Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead[1802] and kept back.[1803]
result.footnotes:
[1802]- i.e., his deeds, which await him in the Hereafter.
[1803]- i.e., that which he did not do or which he delayed.
